document.full_text: a los angeles lawyer was given permanent control of 90-year-old actor mickey rooney's affairs on friday after telling a judge that $400,000 of the hollywood legend's money had gone from his bank accounts.
document.title: actor mickey rooney hands affairs to conservator
lines_and_colors: a los angeles lawyer was given permanent control of 90-year-old actor mickey rooney's affairs on friday after telling a judge that $400,000 of the hollywood legend's money had gone from his bank accounts.
